title: Lamp switch
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to make a lamp switch, the idea is that when the switch is on the lamp turns on and when the switch is off the lamp turns off.

Select **SimpleLamp** to generate a lamp on the screen.

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/SimpleLamp-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open the camera locally.

Move the **lamp**
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplelamp/lamp.png) component to the workspace.
